text: Tapa'inle bhanidinush yadi timra pita, timra choraharu, timra dajubha'iharu, timra patniharu ra timra natedaraharu ra sampatti, juna timile kama'eka chau ra karobara jasama kamibata timila'i bhaya huncha ra ti gharaharu, jasala'i timile mana para'umchau, timila'i allaha ra usako rasula ra usako margama jehada garnubata adhika priya chan bhane allahale sajaya lya'unjela pratiksa gara. Allaha avajnakariharula'i margadarsan gardaina
